info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Berkshire County through 400 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sandisfield, or 14 miles north of Torrington, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sandisfield, South Sandisfield, McClaveville, West New Boston, Konkapot, North Colebrook, New Boston, East Otis, Cold Spring, Montville, Free Quarter and Roosterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
